sections: Since being introduced to the American market by the legendary Max Hoffmann in 1954, the SL-Class from Mercedes-Benz has undergone what seems to be constant revisions with each being more stunning and more powerful than the last.
At the top of the current SL-Class is the

. It features a 577-hp 5.5-liter twin-turbo V-8 mated to a seven-speed automatic capable of propelling the car to 60-mph in just 4.0 seconds. As is the case with all models from the German automaker the interior is filled with genuine leather, polished trim, and the most advanced tech available. Exterior style is also sure to excite, with one of the sportiest looks to come from Mercedes-Benz. When brand new these absolutely stunning
were accompanied by an MSRP of well over $100k.
Right now, Awesome Joe Auctions is offering enthusiasts the chance of a lifetime. This

is currently up for grabs with a starting bid of just over $89k. It is finished in a beautiful Designo white metallic over a Bengal red and black nappa leather interior. It features the coveted Bang & Olufsen sound system and the Drivers Assistance Package.

Red painted brake calipers are perfectly encased by the staggered 19-inch front and 20-inch rear AMG cross spoke titanium wheels. Donâ€™t miss this incredible opportunity to get behind the wheel of one of the best SL-Class cars Mercedes-Benz has ever made. With only 12k-miles showing on the dash, you can be sure its just like new.  For more information on this SL63 visit
